name: LightRiver
description:
You are the breath of the forest,the spirit of the mountain.Form can not imprison you. Dodge the Obstacles and try to rescue dying animals as much as possible ，as your energy is running out.

Press "A" and "D" to move horizontally.

Press "W" to fly , automatically changing into Flying Form.

Click Mouse Left to spread your shed to protect yourself or rescue animals.
